datasetContent.text: The domain we worked on is the MUC-4 (1992) terrorism domaln.
Nouns are extracted from the first 18 59 passages (dev-muc4-0001 to dev-muc4-0018) of the corpus of news wire art.ides to form our test corpus.
The nouns extracted are the head nouns within noun phrases which are recognised by WordNet, including proper nouns such as "United States".
These 1023 nouns are hand-tagged with their sense and semantic class in the particular context to form the answer keys for subsequent experiments.
